participant_abstract.sent: This meeting was the most productive one we have had so far.
Each team member had received a large amount of information and processed it very well.
Individual presentations were very useful and informative.
Contributions made from each team member added new elements that added information about what our objectives and goals should be.
We were a little pressed for time because of the large number of options and amount of information.
There was a very pleasing group atmosphere where we not only informed one another, but also laughed with one another.
We achieved all that we needed to, and I am very hopeful about finding the solution to this project.

participant_actions.sent: All will put powerpoint in the shared folders.
ID and UID will make a clay model.
PM will put minutes in shared folder.

participant_decisions.sent: Energy source will be a kinetic battery.
Case out of latex/rubber and curved.
Push buttons (as few as possible)- only 8/9.
On television screen menu for additional functions.

participant_problems.sent: Too much information for the time period.
Marketing expert disagreed with findings of marketing research.
Didn't know difference between latex and rubber.
Small debate over whether to have a scroll button or not.
Some time management issues- there is not a clock in the room, and i can't see computer clock when i am using the powerpoint presentation.
